name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented Manual QA Engineer with a strong focus on mobile applications across iOS and Android platforms, leveraging extensive experience in API testing and mobile testing methodologies. Proficient in using **Postman**, **Jira**, **Firebase**, and **Crashlytics** for effective bug tracking, testing, and documentation. Experienced in managing mobile app release cycles on **Google Play** and **TestFlight**, coupled with a solid understanding of mobile test automation frameworks like **Appium** and **Playwright**. Adept at working in agile environments, collaborating effectively within teams to ensure quality standards are met. 

In addition to my QA expertise, I bring 13+ years of full-stack development experience utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** across healthcare and financial sectors. My hands-on experience with modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** enhances my understanding of application performance and testing requirements. I have a strong background in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
